Html: Isn't there a control like the Silverlight DataForm for WPF?

Hi, we don't have a DataForm for WPF, but we have discussed adding one in a future release.  I will certainly pass on this feedback. 

In the meantime, the new Data Sources Window in the Visual Studio Designer for WPF in Visual Studio 2010 Beta 1 can help you get started with building a similar-looking control.  If you use the wizard to hook up your data source, you can then drag on a Details grid which will generate a Label and a TextBox for each field in your data and will also hook up the CollectionViewSource to browse the data.  With a little manipulation, you should be able to change the layout to more closely match the DataForm and add on some quick buttons to let you page through each record.  Hope that helps!

Thanks!
Samantha
